name: unreal

unreal adjective
(IMAGINARY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
as if imagined; strange and dream-like: The whole bizarre evening had an unreal quality to it.

slang surprising, unusual, or hard to believe: We just ate and ate, and I was so full it was unreal.
